properties.areaDesc: Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway; Haines Borough and Lynn Canal
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 27 at 12:42PM AKST until January 29 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 24
inches. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph when they switch to
the south on Wednesday near sea level.

* WHERE...Skagway area including the Klondike Highway and the
Haines area including the Haines Highway. Highest amounts near
Haines border and near White Pass.

* WHEN...From 6 PM Tuesday to 6 PM AKST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of
blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds
could bring down tree branches.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit
511.alaska.gov.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM TUESDAY TO 6 PM AKST WEDNESDAY FOR AREAS AROUND HAINES AND SKAGWAY
